title: Every time i click on lol in my desktop i get bugsplat please help
body: This is extremely annoying please help me rito.

replies.body: Did you recently update to the test version client?  It sounds like a bad driver or maybe game file is failing to load up and resulting in a bugsplat.  Run through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot and fix it up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
